name: Guardian's Tower
description:
(Play on full screen, Browser version still in development, for a complete experience download the game) 

Made for the 75th Mini Jam

Theme: Wisdom

Limitation: Weight as a Mechanic

Guardian's Tower is an exciting 2D strategy game where you have to help a likable wizard reach chests to earn Gems! Be carefull tho, enemy airships wont make it so easy, and if your tower weights too much, it will fall!

 Upgrade your blocks, Unlock new items,  and get the highest score you can. Watch out for those gems, if you lose them all, its Game Over!
